mapper.sql: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, DEPTH, CONTENT, STAR, WRITE_DATE writeDate, PRODUCT_NO productNo, MEMBER_NO memberNo FROM REPLY
mapper.select: SELECT r.REPLY_NO replyNo, r.DEPTH, r.CONTENT, r.STAR, r.WRITE_DATE writeDate, r.PRODUCT_NO productNo, r.MEMBER_NO memberNo, m.MEMBER_ID memberId FROM REPLY r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC

SELECT r.CHREPLY_NO chReplyNo, r.DEPTH, r.CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE writeDate, r.MEMBER_NO memberNo, r.REPLY_NO replyNo, m.MEMBER_ID memberId FROM CHREPLY r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY CHREPLY_NO DESC
SELECT ROUND(AVG(STAR), 1) AS avgStar FROM REPLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO, DEPTH, CONTENT, STAR, WRITE_DATE, PRODUCT_NO, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{depth}, #{content}, #{star}, SYSDATE, #{productNo}, #{memberNo} )
INSERT INTO CHREPLY ( CHREPLY_NO, CONTENT, REPLY_NO, MEMBER_NO, WRITE_DATE, DEPTH ) VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ1.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{replyNo}, #{memberNo}, SYSDATE, #{depth} )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET STAR = #{star}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: WITH stats AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN star = 5.0 THEN '5점 MAX' WHEN star >= 4.0 AND star < 5.0 THEN '4점 GPA' WHEN star >= 3.0 AND star < 4.0 THEN '3점 GPA' WHEN star >= 2.0 AND star < 3.0 THEN '2점 GPA' WHEN star >= 1.0 AND star < 2.0 THEN '1점 GPA' END AS rating_range, COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN star = 5.0 THEN 1 WHEN star >= 4.0 AND star < 5.0 THEN 2 WHEN star >= 3.0 AND star < 4.0 THEN 3 WHEN star >= 2.0 AND star < 3.0 THEN 4 WHEN star >= 1.0 AND star < 2.0 THEN 5 END AS rating_index FROM reply GROUP BY CASE WHEN star = 5.0 THEN '5점 MAX' WHEN star >= 4.0 AND star < 5.0 THEN '4점 GPA' WHEN star >= 3.0 AND star < 4.0 THEN '3점 GPA' WHEN star >= 2.0 AND star < 3.0 THEN '2점 GPA' WHEN star >= 1.0 AND star < 2.0 THEN '1점 GPA' END, CASE WHEN star = 5.0 THEN 1 WHEN star >= 4.0 AND star < 5.0 THEN 2 WHEN star >= 3.0 AND star < 4.0 THEN 3 WHEN star >= 2.0 AND star < 3.0 THEN 4 WHEN star >= 1.0 AND star < 2.0 THEN 5 END ), total AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM reply ) SELECT s.rating_range, s.count, ROUND(s.count * 100.0 / t.total_count, 1) AS percentage, s.rating_index FROM stats s, total t ORDER BY s.rating_index
